about_the_game:
PECK'EM is a chaotically casual multiplayer 3D arena fighting game featuring cute pigeons and over-the-top fight sequences! The game is set in a future where humans have left for the stars and made pigeons the custodians of Earth.

Gameplay

Ever imagined what it would be like if birds could use magic?

Or if they could wield weapons like... a katana?
Well, that's precisely what you can expect in PECK'EM!

Choose from 4 unique Pigeons, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles, and brawl it out with your friends! Every bird in the game will boast a unique signature ability that will (literally) blow your opponents away. And all it takes is just a single button press! So grab your "non-gamer" friends and have them give it a spin too!



* PECK'EM will feature a number of different game modes upon release. Currently, only Versus (1v1 and 2v2) are available.

Setting

In the distant future, human technology has allowed for the cybernetic augmentation of biological life. Humans then choose pigeons to watch over Earth while they went off to explore the depths of space.


The game's plot centres around the fictional city of Singacoop, which features urban landscapes highly-inspired by the city of Singapore.

Explore the iconic (and reimagined) Toa Payoh Dragon Playground as a Pigeon and visit other iconic tourist hotspots of Singacoop!

TLDR


  • A 2v2 3D party brawler where players brawl it out as unique Pigeons!
  • Simple controls! Anyone, regardless of age and skill level can enjoy it.
  • A wacky and loveable cast of Pigeon characters for players to get to know.
  • Each Pigeon boasts an epic signature ability that can potentially turn the tide of battle!
  • Set in Singacoop, a city inspired by the diverse, urban environments of Singapore.
